summary: This is a simple mod that alters climate in all regions so that it is always either overcast cloudy, rain, storm, snow, blizzard. Most of the time it will be just clouds with distant fog.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod that alters climate in all regions so that it is always either overcast cloudy, fog, rain, storm, snow, blizzard depending on the region. There is only 6 types of weather. Overcast cloudy, rain, storm and overcast cloudy, snow, snow storm for snowy regions.

 NOTICE: Incompatible with any other mods that alter climate or weather. When you start from a save game that already has clear weather, weather will not change instantly. It will take up to 1 day or so. Also on a new game at Helgen weather is scripted, so it will be what ever it is scripted to be - does not mean this mod does not work.
author: megatenP
